thread.title: 19 Things You Missed At The 2017 SAG Awards
thread.title_full: 19 Things You Missed At The 2017 SAG Awards

author: Whitney Jefferson
title: 19 Things You Missed At The 2017 SAG Awards
text:
View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421388 2. Winona Ryder made some memorable faces . TNT / Via buzzfeed.com
TNT / Via buzzfeed.com
 ID: 10421915 3. Taraji P. Henson perfected her victory dance. TNT / Via giphy.com
TNT / Via giphy.com
 ID: 10421942 4. And gave an inspiring speech by paying tribute to the real-life women behind the movie Hidden Figures . View this image ›
TNT / Via giphy.com ID: 10421944 5. Julia Louis-Dreyfus shared some family history, and the fact that she’s the daughter of an immigrant. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421378 6. Sarah Paulson shared a moment of camaraderie with her The People v. O.J. Simpson co-star Courtney B. Vance. TNT
TNT
 ID: 10421524 7. Dolly Parton honored her 9 To 5 costar Lily Tomlin with a Life Achievement award. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421656 8. And Lily discovered that the award she’d been given was multi-faceted. TNT
TNT
 ID: 10421672 9. Mahershala Ali spoke about becoming a muslim, and having to tell his mother, a minister. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421521 10. John Lithgow shouted out Meryl Streep. TNT
TNT
 ID: 10421711 11. Maisie Williams and Sophie Turner realized they could be seen behind Jeff Bridges’ shoulder. TNT / Via europa51.tumblr.com
TNT / Via europa51.tumblr.com
 ID: 10421742 12. Kerry Washington used her “I’m an actor” speech to speak about Hollywood’s voice. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421382 13. Taylor Schilling spoke on the importance of storytelling in 2017. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421442 14. Viola Davis pulled out the slippers she’d hidden inside of her purse. View this image ›
E! / Via buzzfeed.com ID: 10421732 15. The cast of Captain Fantastic cheered in unison. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421955 16. Ryan Gosling laughed. View this image ›
TNT ID: 10421605 17. Ryan Michelle Bathe and Sterling K. Brown were #couplegoals on the red carpet. View this image ›
SAG / Via giphy.com ID: 10421470 18. Dev Patel was adorably bashful about his nomination. View this image ›
TNT / Via giphy.com ID: 10421557 19. And the Stranger Things kids continued to be adorable. TNT / Via giphy.com
TNT / Via giphy.com
 ID: 10421977
